UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Probing human proteins for short encrypted antimicrobial peptides reveals Hs10, a peptide with selective activity for gram-negative bacteria.
Literature.Author: Santos MA, Silva FL, Lira BOV, Cardozo Fh JL, Vasconcelos AG, Araujo AR, Murad AM, Garay AV, Freitas SM, Leite JRSA, Bloch Jr C, Ramada MHS, Oliveira AL, Brand GD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data)
